summary: Put in charge of his young son, Alain leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Alain's bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.
cast: Marion Cotillard|Matthias Schoenaerts|Armand Verdure|Céline Sallette|Corinne Masiero|Bouli Lanners|Jean-Michel Correia|Yannick Choirat|Mourad Frarema|Fred Menut|Duncan Versteegh|Katia Chaperon|Catherine Fa|Andès Lopez Jabois|Océane Cartia|Françoise Michaud|Irina Coito|David Billaud|Yvon L'Allain|Fabien Baïardi|Laetitia Malbranque|Soulyane Rajraji|Pascal Rozand|Hedi Touihri|Martine Millar|Anne-Marie Tomat
keywords: double amputee|killer whale|breaking through ice|pubic hair|antibes
title: De óxido y hueso
